text: The Victoria's Secret Fashion Show is an annual promotional event sponsored by and featuring Victoria's Secret. From 1995 to 2018, Victoria's Secret used the show to promote its items. Models under contract to the company, known as Victoria's Secret Angels, would model at the event. The fashion show was cancelled in 2019, the same year its organizer, Edward Razek, resigned. The show started again in 2023 and in 2024, Victoria's Secret announced a return of the show. ==References== Category:Fashion
title: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show
